text: bilateral myringotomies with armstrong grommet tubes, adenoidectomy, and tonsillectomy
context: bilateral myringotomies with armstrong grommet tubes, adenoidectomy, and tonsillectomy.

text: serous fluid in middle ear space
context: serous fluid was aspirated from the middle ear space.
an armstrong grommet tube was placed down through the incision and rotated into place.

the adenoids were removed using the microdebrider.
the tonsils were completely dissected out of this plane, preserving both the anterior and posterior tonsillar pillars.
